__e: And now, your husband has told me to tell you... that your butler, Drake, is waiting to serve lunch.
Alice, didn't my father know Dr Drake was here?
Well, uh, Mr. Drake is dropping by, and I was wondering if I could just break away for a... for an early lunch.
I know that, but Drake doesn't believe it.
Listen, Drake, I didn't ask to come into your life, did I?
- Did you see anyone enter the library after Drake went in?
The last thing on my mind is Evan Drake and where he sleeps.
Find Mr. Drake and tell him I must see him, if only for a moment.
Absolutely-- just pretend that I'm Mr. Drake here, and you've finally gotten me alone and you're going to tell me.
